commands-cannot-autodetect-world: Only living players can use ~ for their world!
commands-console-missing-player-name: When running from console, specify player name.
commands-cooldown-wait: <red>Wait {duration} second(s) before using this command again.
commands-error: <dark_red>Oups! <red>The command failed :( Check the console and report the error.
commands-header-no-subcommands: <red>There are no arguments for this command.
commands-header-no-subcommands-permissio: <red>You don't have permissions to view any subcommands.
commands-invalid-number: The number must be a whole or a decimal number. Got: '{input}'
commands-invalid-time: Expected time such as '3 hours' or '15 minutes', got: '{input}'
commands-no-console: <red>You may only use this command as a player.
commands-perms-description: List all permissions the plugin has.
commands-reload-fail: <dark_red>Oups, <red>reloading failed! See the console for more information. Error: {error}
commands-reload-file-load-error: <dark_red>Oups, <red>there was a problem loading files from your disk! See the console for more information. Boss has not been reloaded.
commands-use-while-null: <red>Cannot use this command while the plugin is {state}.
conversation-not-conversing: You can only use this command when you are asked to type something in the chat.
menu-cannot-open-during-conversation: <red>Type 'exit' to quit your conversation before opening menu.
menu-error: <red>Oups! There was a problem with this menu! Please contact the administrator to review the console for details.
pages-invalid-page: <red>Your input '{input}' is not a valid number.
pages-no-page: Pages do not contain the given page number.
pages-no-page-number: <red>Please specify the page number for this command.
pages-no-pages: <red>You do not have any pages saved to show.
player-not-played-before: <red>Player {player} <red>has not played before or we could not locate his disk data.
tool-error: <red>Oups! There was a problem with this tool! Please contact the administrator to review the console for details.
